casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Charles Melvin MCGLOTHAN, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 155682
COA: 334817 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 29, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's February 20, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because it does not appear that the order was entered erroneously.
